name: The Court of Natural Order
description:
Dear Necromancer #9360, The Court of Natural Order has found you guilty of several unpermitted resurrections and attacks on 'mortals'...

You've been captured by the Court of Natural Order, have had your unlimited powers sealed, and are being forced to use your diabolically evil magic for good! As community service, you must travel the lands, healing fallen adventurers and purifying monstrous creatures.

Features:

  • Traverse 2 different levels, healing friends and foes alike as you draw closer to a great source of evil...
  • As you progress, your power is slowly unsealed, granting you new magical abilities to aid you in your journey.

Made for the UOLCSS Summer Jam 2021. Many, many things in this game are scuffed beyond belief, time constraints are fun.
